description: Users may experience denial of service issues with PowerShell version 7.3, leading to system instability and potential inability to execute scripts. This could result in critical operations being halted and system administrators being unable to manage affected systems effectively. Refer to the security update KB5031358 for PowerShell 7.3, which addresses these impacts along with build numbers 10.0.22000.2538 and 10.0.22621.2428 for Windows 11 systems.
